WorkItem.Description: The latest version has now prioritized dodge ahead of agility (I'm at the soft health cap). The agility drop could be partially explained by the drop in bear damage, but it seems overdone at about a 50% absolute drop. I noted also that mastery is not showing up in the RSV list so perhaps something is broken in the Savage Defense calculations that is causing this.

Comments.Message: Bear is now tied to the Boss Handler for incoming damage. You need to set up the Boss to do attacks, just use The Average Boss and you should be fine.
Setting it the Average Boss works.  I had it set to the Hardest Boss, but apparently, that configuration doesn't have any Offensive data set up.
